pullrequest.title: Use PRIVATE_FOR to skip cmake dependencies in addition to pkg-config

content.raw:
ign-sensors:

* fails when `libfreeimage-dev` is not installed right before running examples: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/commits/db1ef0570ccd2c317c2d99439fd9ce5131aac9f0
* passes after building ign-cmake from this branch, and rebuilding ign-common3 with `libfreeimage-dev`, then uninstalling it #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/branch/fix_private_for#diff

so I think that demonstrates the fix

  • fails when libfreeimage-dev is not installed right before running examples: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/commits/db1ef0570ccd2c317c2d99439fd9ce5131aac9f0
  • passes after building ign-cmake from this branch, and rebuilding ign-common3 with libfreeimage-dev, then uninstalling it #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/branch/fix_private_for#diff

so I think that demonstrates the fix
